user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Process the creation of hourly hydrogen demand profiles, split the generated nodes into required subsets, and convert the profiles into the TST workbook format for the TYNDP study team without accessing any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Decompose annual hydrogen demand figures into hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios using the NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE scenarios with input years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. tasks.description: Split the generated nodes (model elements) into the required subsets as specified in the scenario.
